tool_description: Generate and manage your invoices with simple API calls
name: Dhana Invoice
title: Dhana Invoice

api_list.name: Generate Invoice
api_list.description: Generate a new Invoice in PDF/Image/HTML format
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dhana-invoice.p.rapidapi.com/invoice/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dhana-invoice.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dhana-invoice.p.rapidapi.com/invoice/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dhana-invoice.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
